alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 22 at 3:49AM EST until January 23 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In Vermont, Bennington, Western Windham and Eastern Windham Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 5 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning commute and may impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may exceed one inch per hour at times this evening and tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
